item.title: Investing for Your Product’s Retirement
item.dc:creator: Andrea Hill
item.description:
Logic isn’t what drives our behavior. And it explains why so many companies aren’t investing in innovation.

The post Investing for Your Product’s Retirement appeared first on Innovation & New Product Development | Frameplay | Ottawa, Canada | JTBD : Design Thinking : Workshops.

item.title: Never Ask “Would You Use This Product?”
item.dc:creator: Andrea Hill
item.description:
In his blog post “The One Customer Development Question You Need to Stop Asking Immediately“, Mike Fishbein cautions against asking Would you use this product during a customer interview. If you ask “would you use this product” during your customer interview, your potential customer may say yes or no. If he says no, you don’t know why. …

Continue reading "Never Ask “Would You Use This Product?”"

The post Never Ask “Would You Use This Product?” appeared first on Innovation & New Product Development | Frameplay | Ottawa, Canada | JTBD : Design Thinking : Workshops.
